name: Rails Devise GraphQL
description: This is a boilerplate to build your next Saas product. It's a RubyOnRails 6 API only backend with Authentication and GrpahQL API.

CLIENT_URL.description: Enter the client domain for CORS. Choose http://0.0.0.0:8000 when using our gatsby frontend.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: Specifies the number of `workers` to boot in clustered mode.

RAILS_MAX_THREADS.description: Puma can serve each request in a thread from an internal thread pool.

DEVISE_JWT_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed JWT tokens.
